name: CalWORKs Child Care
description: Free or subsidized child care for CalWORKs participants (3 stages)
fullDescription: CalWORKs Child Care provides free or subsidized childcare for families receiving CalWORKs benefits, helping parents participate in work or training activities through three progressive stages.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free or subsidized child care
- Stage 1: County-administered (current CalWORKs)
- Stage 2: Transitional (leaving CalWORKs)
- Stage 3: Long-term subsidized care
- Supports work and training
- Continuous coverage through stages
howToGetIt:
1. Must be receiving CalWORKs benefits
2. Contact your county welfare office
3. Request child care assistance
4. Choose approved child care provider
5. Complete required paperwork
6. Transition through stages as eligible
keywords: CalWORKs, childcare, subsidized daycare, Stage 1, Stage 2, Stage 3, welfare, work training, free childcare
